schema:caption.rdfs:comment: The caption for this object. For downloadable machine formats (closed caption, subtitles etc.) use MediaObject and indicate the [[encodingFormat]].
schema:caption.rdfs:label: caption

schema:embeddedTextCaption.rdfs:comment: Represents textual captioning from a [[MediaObject]], e.g. text of a 'meme'.
schema:embeddedTextCaption.rdfs:label: embeddedTextCaption

schema:transcript.rdfs:comment: If this MediaObject is an AudioObject or VideoObject, the transcript of that object.
schema:transcript.rdfs:label: transcript
